count.map:
# vim: filetype=coffee :

(doc) ->
  emit null, 1 if doc.pending
count.reduce:
# vim: set filetype=coffee :

(keys, values) ->
  sum values

done.map:
# vim: set filetype=coffee :

(doc) ->
  emit doc.dequeued, doc.payload unless doc.pending

fifo.map:
# vim: set filetype=coffee :

(doc) ->
  emit doc.timestamp, doc.payload if doc.pending
